Description of incident: The Montana Department of Public Health and Human Services announced a data breach that occured when hackers had access to the server for nearly a year. The server contains names, addresses, dates of birth, Social Security numbers and clinical information of customers along with the Social Security numbers and bank account information of employees.The agency has set up a help line for those who may have been affected at 1-800-809-29561-800-809-2956.CallSend SMSAdd to SkypeYou'll need Skype CreditFree via Skype
